info.title: ekiden-gateway
info.description: API Gateway and WebSocket proxy based on Axum and Utoipa, handling auth, rate limiting, and connection buffering.

get.description: Query account balances. Returns all subaccounts' vault balances.

post.description: Initiate a withdrawal from a Trading vault to the Funding vault.
Authorize and obtain an access token
Authorize a session key via delegation

get.description: Query users' execution records, sorted by execTime in descending order.

get.summary: Get system configuration and discovery info

get.description:
This refers to the net long and short positions as percentages of all position holders during the selected time.
Long account ratio = Number of holders with long positions / Total number of holders
Short account ratio = Number of holders with short positions / Total number of holders
Long-short account ratio = Long account ratio / Short account ratio

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor. Use the next_page_cursor token from the response to retrieve the next page of the data set

get.description: Query for historical funding rates. Each symbol has a different funding interval. For example, if the interval is 8 hours and the current time is UTC 12, then it returns the last funding rate, which settled at UTC 8.
Query for historical index price klines. Charts are returned in groups based on the requested interval.
Query for historical klines (also known as candles/candlesticks). Charts are returned in groups based on the requested interval.
Query for historical mark price klines. Charts are returned in groups based on the requested interval.
Get the open interest of each symbol.
Query for orderbook depth data.
Query for order price limit parameters.
Query for recent public trades, optionally filtered by symbol.
Query for the risk limit margin parameters.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor. Use the next_page_cursor token from the response to retrieve the next page of the data set

get.description: Query for the latest price snapshot, best bid/ask price, and trading volume in the last 24 hours.

post.description: Amend multiple existing orders in a single request
Cancel all existing orders for a user
Cancel multiple existing orders in a single request

get.description: Query order history. As order creation/cancellation is asynchronous, the data returned from this endpoint may delay.

parameters.name: sub_account_address
parameters.description: Trading vault address (subaccount) to query against.

post.description: Create multiple new orders in a single request

get.description: Primarily query unfilled or partially filled orders in real-time, but also supports querying recent 500 closed status (Cancelled, Filled) orders. Please see the usage of request param open_only.

parameters.name: open_only
parameters.description:
* `true` (default): query open status orders (New or PartiallyFilled).
* `false`: query a maximum of recent 500 closed status orders (Cancelled, Rejected, Filled).

get.description: Query user's closed profit and loss records
Query real-time position data, such as position size, cumulative realized PNL, etc.

parameters.name: sub_account_address
parameters.description: Trading vault address (subaccount) to query against.

post.description: Set the take profit, stop loss or trailing stop for the position.

get.description: Query leaderboard data
Return the Root Account address for the current user
List Sub Accounts under the Root Account

available_balance.description: The amount of an asset that can be used to open USDC Perpetual positions (USDC)

equity.description:
Equity under the account without considering the collateral value ratio (calculated in USDC).
Equity = Vault Balance + Perp & Futures Unrealized P&L + Unrealized Funding

margin_balance.description:
Amount that can be used as margin under the account
after considering the collateral value ratio (calculated in USDC)
Total Vault Balance + Perp Unrealized P&L

sub_account_address.description: Sub-Account address (the owner of the technical vault)

total_order_im.description: Pre-occupied margin for order. Locked balance (USDC)

total_position_im.description: Sum of initial margin of all positions + Pre-occupied liquidation fee.

total_position_mm.description: Sum of maintenance margin for all positions.

unrealized_funding.description: Aggregated unrealized funding across all positions (USDC)

full_message.description:
Optional Aptos Wallet Standard full message (APTOS-prefixed, newline-delimited).
If provided, the backend will verify the signature against this exact string
and also validate that it contains `message: AUTHORIZE|{timestamp_ms}|{nonce}` and a matching `nonce:`.

Example:

APTOS\nmessage: AUTHORIZE|1731541800000|b7d1c2e8f5a94f3db2f8c6a9d1e4\nnonce: b7d1c2e8f5a94f3db2f8c6a9d1e4

BatchAmendOrdersRequest.description:
Batch amend order request.
You can amend unfilled or partially filled orders.
TODO: Maximum 20 orders per request

exit_info.description: Information about the exit status of each order in the batch.

BatchCancelOrdersRequest.description:
Batch cancel order request.
You can cancel unfilled or partially filled orders.
TODO: Maximum 20 orders per request

exit_info.description: Information about the exit status of each order in the batch.

BatchPlaceOrdersRequest.description:
Batch place order request.
TODO: Maximum 20 orders per request
TODO: Rate limiting (10 reqs per sec, 20 * 10 = 200 orders in one sec)

exit_info.description: Information about the exit status of each order in the batch.

CancelAllOrdersRequest.description:
Request to cancel all orders, optionally filtered by symbol
TODO: Cancels up to 500 orders per request
TODO: System picks up 500 orders randomly to cancel when you have over 500 orders

exit_info.description: Information about the exit status of the cancel all operation.

fill_count.description: The number of fills in a single order

trigger_by.description: Last Price, Mark Price, or Index Price.

trigger_price.description: The price level that activates the order.

ExecType.description: Execution type for trade history entries.

is_maker.description: Is maker order. true: maker, false: taker

leaves_qty.description: Remaining quantity not yet executed after this fill

seq.description:
Cross sequence, used to associate each fill and each position update
* The seq will be the same when conclude multiple transactions at the same time
* Different symbols may have the same seq, please use seq + symbol to check unique

oneOf.description: Stop order type if this was a stop order

GetLongShortRatioResponse.description: This refers to the net long and short positions as percentages of all position holders during the selected time.

next_page_cursor.description: Cursor. Use the next_page_cursor token from the response to retrieve the next page of the data set

c.description: Close - the price of the last trade in this candle (closing price).

h.description: High - the highest trade price within this interval.

l.description: Low - the minimum trade price within this interval.

n.description: Trade count. The number of trades included in this candle

o.description: Open - the price of the first trade in this candle (opening price).

v.description: Volume. the trading volume for the candle

buy_ratio.description: The ratio of the number of long position

sell_ratio.description: The ratio of the number of short position

avg_price.description: Average price at which part (or all) of the order has been executed (i.e. filled)

closed_pnl.description:
Closed profit and loss for each close position order.
Valid only in order WebSocket

cum_exec_fee.description: Cumulative executed trading fee: the total fees charged so far for the executed portion of this order

cum_exec_qty.description:
Cumulative executed quantity: total amount of the order
that has already been filled/executed so far

cum_exec_value.description:
Cumulative executed value: the total value corresponding to the part of
the order that has already been filled. Basically: how much worth in total has been executed so far

expire_time.description: Expiration time for orders with a time-in-force of Good-Til-Date (GTD)

last_price_on_created.description: Last price at the time the order was created

leaves_qty.description: Remaining quantity from the order that has not yet been executed

leaves_value.description:
Estimated value of the remaining quantity (leavesQty)
that remains unfilled. Basically: how much the unfilled portion is worth

order_type.description: Order type. Market, Limit. For TP/SL orders, is the order type after the order was triggered

oneOf.description: Stop order type. For example, Stop Market or Stop Limit.
Take Profit / Stop Loss details if set
Conditional order details if this is a conditional order

items.description: Order book level consisting of price and size.

OrderBookLevel.description: Order book level consisting of price and size.

OrderBookSnapshot.description: Order book Snapshot at a specific point in time.

mts.description:
The timestamp from the matching engine when this orderbook data is produced.
It can be correlated with T from public trade channel

ts.description: The timestamp (ms) that the system generates the data

u.description: Update ID, is always in sequence

OrderListResponse.description: Response for order list and order history requests.

OrderPriceLimit.description: Order price limits for a given trading symbol.

smp_group.description:
Self-match prevention group id. Orders with the same `(user_id, smp_group)` are eligible
for SMP checks.

oneOf.description: Self-match prevention (SMP/STP) strategy. If unset, SMP is disabled.

Position.description:
Position information.

* risk_id: numeric identifier of the current risk tier your position is on for that symbol.
* risk_limit_value: the maximum position value allowed under that tier (the tiers limit). If your position value grows beyond this, the tier steps up (higher requirements).

Details:
* Meaning: Bybit enforces risk limit tiers to cap position value and scale maintenance margin. The tier is referenced by riskId, and its cap is riskLimitValue.
* Effects: Higher tiers allow larger positions but increase maintenance margin and may constrain leverage.
* Portfolio margin note: In portfolio margin mode, both fields are not meaningful and are returned as 0 (docs: risk limit rules are invalid).

created_time.description: Timestamp of the first time a position was created on this symbol (ms)

cum_funding.description: Net realized funding PnL accumulated for this position (receive positive, pay negative).

margin_mode.description: Is position cross margin or isolated margin

position_im_by_mp.description: Initial margin calculated by mark price

position_mm_by_mp.description: Maintenance margin calculated by mark price

realized_pnl_cum.description: Sum of all historical Current Realized PnLs (and the latest one).

realized_pnl_cur.description:
Sum of Fill Realized PnL for position of this symbol/side
since this position was created last time

seq.description:
Cross sequence, used to associate each fill and each position update
* Different symbols may have the same seq, please use seq + symbol to check unique

side.description: Position side. Buy: long, Sell: short

trailing_stop.description: Trailing stop (The distance from market price)

unrealized_funding.description: Net unsettled funding PnL for this position (receive positive, pay negative).

unrealized_pnl.description:
How much USDC an account will receive (or pay if negative)
if the position is closed at the current MarkPrice

PriceKlineSnapshot.description: Price-only kline entry. Used for mark price and index price klines.

PublicTrade.description: A single trade entry from the public trade stream.

T.description: The timestamp (ms) that the order is filled.

mm_duration.description: The maintenance margin deduction value when risk limit tier changed

SessionAuthRequest.description: A request to authenticate using a Session Key.

SessionDelegation.description: A delegation of authority from a Root Key to a Session Key.

SetTradingStopRequest.description: Set the take profit, stop loss or trailing stop for the position.

sl_size.description:
Stop loss size
valid for TP/SL partial mode, note: the value of tpSize and slSize must equal

tp_size.description:
Take profit size
valid for TP/SL partial mode, note: the value of tpSize and slSize must equal

build_id.description:
Build identifier for the running backend (e.g. git commit SHA).

This is used for milestone acceptance verification without disclosing source code.

TickerSnapshot.description: Query for the latest price snapshot, best bid/ask price, and trading volume in the last 24 hours.

high_price_24h.description: The highest price in the last 24 hours

low_price_24h.description: The lowest price in the last 24 hours
